name: Gone Amongst The Dead
description:
Controls:

w,a,s,d - to move

Melee: left click - to melee attack

Rupture: right click release over enemy - to teleport and kill

Info:

bottom left: tells you whether or not rupture is available

middle left: your health bar

Extras:

This game was made for the 118 Mini Jam. Made in 3 days, it may have a few issues that i may not have noticed, so sorry for any inconveniences.
